Reviews.Content: nice room great bathroom oversized tub towel rack speakers connected television comfortable friendly close everything
Reviews.Author: Comfortluver

Reviews.Content: quiet hotel central location room good size updated bathroom staff members speak english seemed nice mini bar charge open take charges bill problem used fridge food dont eat restaurant good overpriced restaurant great wouldnt rate 4star hotel 3
Reviews.Author: tkapts

Reviews.Content: booking trip hotel reading reviews site expecting worse got found really pleasant experience room really spacious bathroom large enough 2 people two sink bed accommodated 4 people found bit noisy night around 4am people shouting street overall found hotel excellent got good price trip hotel seemed bargain fantastic location walked everywhere 3 days highly recommend indonesian restaurant around corner next flower market would definitely recommend
Reviews.Author: mcinb

Reviews.Content: jolly carlton well situated hotel nearly everyone mentioned sitting right beside flower market less 10 minutes walk dam square leidseplein really couldnt much better located unless youre planning spend time hotel really main thing reception staff helpful lobby hotel welcoming room clean whilst huge wasnt cramped either people double ordered turned two single beds seperate sheets etc trying first night far apart requested change double bed whilst able accomodate us second night moved us rest stay whilst double 2 singles least joined beds single sheet etc apart reception staff accomodating moved luggage etc rooms experienced one slight problem water temperature seemed jump moment 4 days 2 people showering twice day occasion need take tram stop front door hotel handy taking tram centraal station museums area overall hotel clean well located great base exploring amsterdam really 5 stars would happily recommend anyone going given reasonable price got 4 nights price 3 lastminute
Reviews.Author: Catdangler

Reviews.Content: would agree comments posted jolly certainly excellent location right flower market room quite large airconditioned despite overlooking main road quiet ensured good nights sleep however decor dated needs upgrading style looked little bit grubby also noted made bed housekeeping onto side table seemed little reception seemed friendly although bother much efficient organising shuttle bus airport us arrived promptly much better value 12 euros ripoff taxi taken earlier hotel offer include breakfast little steep 12 euros lots much better cafes around lastly strange arrangement minibar locked opened charged even drink anything wanted cool drinks charged 15 euros empty minibar thought bit strange overall satisfactory hotel probably wouldnt stay
Reviews.Author: TravelNovice

Reviews.Content: cannot beat location hotel amsterdam also quiet night despite tram line flower market etc breakfast go cafes road instead staff extremely helpful polite get bus schipol hotel door like bus rooms small clean rather expensive room hotels amsterdam seem around even worse locations
Reviews.Author: PatsyBuenosAires

Reviews.Content: found rooms quite basic comfortable restaurant good expected overall though hotel good value money use tram get centraal quite hike

Reviews.Content: booked short notice website euro good amsterdam moment room view flower market reception staff efficient room smallish everything needed teacoffee safe room bathroom clean well maintained bad points queen bed 2 singles apart romantic shower going perfect scalding freezing really fix would give 4

Reviews.Content: great 4 days amsterdam hotel middle everything city attractions within easy reach hotel could walk tram bike anywhere rooms small adequate read review water true careful staff friendly helpful problem got smoking room first night asked non smoking put deluxe room great except stale moved next night box room top floor room fine clean 3 hotel nothing got really good deal stay dont think worth price normally charge get good deal hotel would staying great base explore amsterdam

Reviews.Content: overpriced hotel service terrible made feel asking question charged fees everything luxury hotel wireless internet standard local calls fact curtains wouldnt close fact shower would go scalding hot called said showers without turning shower floor got scalding half way shower staff didnt care breakfast way priced suggest going walk across street cafe location 2 star priced try 4 star

Reviews.Content: partner stayed jolly carlton january 2006 great room loved location right service appalling one day room cleaned complained return 430 partner boiling water whilst shower continued cold complained stuck notice shower area warning hot water cap final day check time noon packed things away went leaving items needed marked contrast previous days room cleaned time items left thanks reception housekeeping items garbage 4 star

Reviews.Content: stayed jolly dec 30th dec bit apprehensive read negative worried soon entered hotel new going enjoyable stay hotel fabulous absolutely spotless efficient ever stayed booked upgraded free charge without asking superior room porter took bags us room huge gorgeous 2 beds side side bath robe slippers lady plenty tea coffee sweet message beds bathroom lovely really big 2 shower bath hairdryer bathroom stand think could put usual foreign hotels plug mirror lounge couldnt use hairdryer gave stood went stairs manager asked us liked room thought real touch staff really friendly dutch freezing cold amsterdam warm hotel welcoming heating rooms turn whatever temperature want booked left luggage hotel never seen done bags given really put behind desk locked would stay different hotel go back took schipol shuttle airport every half hour airport return cost 35 euros 2 us right jolly hotel cost us total room per booked net seen fab stay

Reviews.Content: stayed long weekend great time rooms plenty big enough great always plus staff front desk polite efficient taken little surprise hotel tax charge leaving addition hotel room charge wed paid front lucky hadnt spent everything didnt eat restaurant bit pricey plenty places go extremely close wasnt problem room plenty places go breakfast great time jolly hotel wed definitely go

Reviews.Content: pleased stay jolly given mixed reviews site stayed hotel 4 nights end october 2005 could fault service room location fantastic able walk around city direction takes 5 mins walk dam square 6th floor back problems noise thing could say improve hairdryer kind person one morning would suggest take great service would stay

Reviews.Content: reviews hotel seem bit mixed spending two nights recently thought generally good hotel although room rather small clean comfortable airconditioning room great especially amsterdam seems get humid summer however find hotel somewhat expensive side breakfast seemed overpriced phone calls especially expensive one drawback cleaners started cleaning rooms quite early morning woken morning around 800 830 sounds cleaners outside door probably wouldnt bother like get early head explore city youve late night want catch sleep might want keep mind overall though good hotel good location
